title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a must-have for maintaining a healthy and comfortable living environment. This sleek and stylish humidifier is designed to provide you with a soothing cool mist experience. With a tank capacity of 1 gallon, it ensures long-lasting moisture in any room of your home.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in Black not only adds a touch of elegance to your space but also offers advanced features to enhance your experience. The cool mist evaporative technology ensures that the mist is dispersed evenly, creating a refreshing and comfortable atmosphere. You can choose from three different speed settings to customize the humidity level according to your preference.

Never worry about running out of water with the low tank indicator, which alerts you when it's time to refill. The dishwasher-safe design allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring that your humidifier remains in pristine condition.

With a humidity capacity of 142 ml per hour, this humidifier is capable of covering an area of up to 320 square feet, making it ideal for bedrooms, living rooms, or offices. The mechanical knob control type allows for effortless adjustment of settings, giving you complete control over the humidity levels.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier also features an aroma tray, allowing you to add your favorite essential oils for a relaxing and aromatic experience. The empty tank protection ensures that the humidifier automatically shuts off when the water runs out, protecting the device and giving you peace of mind.

Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this lightweight and portable humidifier can be easily moved from one room to another. The compatibility with the BestAir H62 replacement filter ensures that you can enjoy clean and fresh mist every time.

Upgrade your living space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Experience the benefits of optimal humidity levels and create a healthier and more comfortable environment for you and your loved ones.

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in a sleek black color! This humidifier is designed to improve the air quality in your space, providing you with a comfortable and healthy environment.

With a tank capacity of 1 gallon, this humidifier can effectively humidify a medium-sized room. The cool mist evaporative technology ensures that the mist released is cool and refreshing, making it ideal for year-round use.

One of the standout features of this humidifier is the low tank indicator, which alerts you when it's time to refill the tank. This convenient feature ensures that you never run out of mist when you need it the most. Plus, the dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze, saving you time and effort.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier offers a humidity capacity of 142 ml per hour, ensuring that your space stays comfortably moisturized. The included aroma tray allows you to add your favorite scents or essential oils for a soothing and relaxing ambiance.

You can easily adjust the mist output with the three speed settings, allowing you to customize the level of humidity to suit your preference. The mechanical knob control type makes it simple and intuitive to operate.

With a coverage area of 320 square feet, this humidifier is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and more. It weighs just 6.33 lbs, making it lightweight and portable for easy placement wherever you need it.

For maintenance, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring that your humidifier continues to perform optimally. The empty tank protection feature automatically shuts off the humidifier when the tank is empty, providing peace of mind and preventing any damage.

Experience the benefits of a well-humidified space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Say goodbye to dry air and hello to a healthier and more comfortable living environment. Order yours today!
